name: Perfect Wife
description:
Welcome to your New Perfect Wife

Have you ever wanted the perfect wife? Well now you can... and she's FREE

Meet Candise, 28 from Leeds. She can be your new wife, she will say the things your real wife won't :-)

She'll give you compliments
She'll Chat you up
And she even has a naughty side

Perfect wife is a fun Free app. just for Adults

****************

Voiced by Award Winning Voice Artist Guy Harris

Produced by VoiceoverGuy.co.uk & App Style
